--Readme document for Wyatt Nicolas Johnson, wnjohnso@uci.edu--

1. How many assignment points do you believe you completed (replace the *'s with your numbers)?

10/10
- 3/3 Summarizing tweets
- 4/4 Identifying the most popular activities
- 3/3 Adding a text search interface

2. How long, in hours, did it take you to complete this assignment?

13 hours

3. What online resources did you consult when completing this assignment? (list sites like StackOverflow or specific URLs for tutorials; describe queries to Generative AI or use of AI-based code completion)

Consulted Chat GPT for about 2 hours trying to figure out why I could not access the live-server. Chat GPT did not have the answer. 

4. What classmates or other individuals did you consult as part of this assignment? What did you discuss?

Contacted Katelyn Kim regarding the mentioned live-server not functioning on my computer. Turns out I could not have the UCI VPN on which I needed to access uci jupyter hub. I had the biggest facepalm of my life when it worked perfectly fine on VS Code.

5. Is there anything special we need to know in order to run your code?

No
